languages.text: Излил{mf||а} в исповедальную машину правду о своих пороках и преступлениях, воспользовавшись анонимностью механизма.
Poured the truth of sins and crimes into the confession machine under the cloak of anonymity.
languages.original_text: Излил{mf||а} в исповедальную машину правду о своих пороках и преступлениях, воспользовавшись анонимностью механизма.

traits.locale_text: "Poured the truth of sins and crimes into the confession machine under the cloak of anonymity."
"Poured the truth of sins and crimes into the confession machine under the cloak of anonymity."
"Poured the truth of sins and crimes into the confession machine under the cloak of anonymity."
"Poured the truth of sins and crimes into the confession machine under the cloak of anonymity."

languages.text: 匿名に紛れて、罪や犯罪の真実を告白装置に流し込んだ
languages.original_text: Poured the truth of sins and crimes into the confession machine under the cloak of anonymity.

traits.locale_text: 「匿名に紛れて、罪や犯罪の真実を告白装置に流し込んだ」

languages.text: Vertiste la verdad de pecados e infracciones dentro de la máquina confesora amparándote en el anonimato.
languages.original_text: Poured the truth of sins and crimes into the confession machine under the cloak of anonymity.

traits.locale_text: «Vertiste la verdad de pecados e infracciones dentro de la máquina confesora amparándote en el anonimato».

languages.text: 你在匿名的掩护下，向自动忏悔机吐露了你犯下的恶行与罪孽。
languages.original_text: Poured the truth of sins and crimes into the confession machine under the cloak of anonymity.

traits.locale_text: “你在匿名的掩护下，向自动忏悔机吐露了你犯下的恶行与罪孽。”

languages.text: Die Wahrheit von Sünden und Verbrechen unter dem Deckmantel der Anonymität in die Beichtmaschine gegossen.
languages.original_text: Poured the truth of sins and crimes into the confession machine under the cloak of anonymity.

traits.locale_text: "Die Wahrheit von Sünden und Verbrechen unter dem Deckmantel der Anonymität in die Beichtmaschine gegossen."

languages.text: Vous avez déversé la vérité des péchés et des crimes dans la machine à confessions sous le couvert de l'anonymat.
languages.original_text: Poured the truth of sins and crimes into the confession machine under the cloak of anonymity.

traits.locale_text: « Vous avez déversé la vérité des péchés et des crimes dans la machine à confessions sous le couvert de l'anonymat. »

languages.text: Günahların ve suçların gerçeğini, anonimlik kisvesi altında günah çıkarma makinesine döktü.
languages.original_text: Poured the truth of sins and crimes into the confession machine under the cloak of anonymity.

traits.locale_text: "Günahların ve suçların gerçeğini, anonimlik kisvesi altında günah çıkarma makinesine döktü."
